name: Blinded By Fire
description:
A Single-Player Top Down 2D Video Game full of combat and puzzles, unfolding in a Mythical Realm of Fire.

- A Solo Project

An Adventurer's Quest to find her missing lover who couldn't wait a bit more to start their Adventure Journey together. He had ventured all alone, acting all brave. She already knew his whereabouts. It was time to set foot and head straight to the flame castle. Known as a dangerous place, full of misery, traps, and entities, always burning hot.Ruled for centuries by an unspeakably evil.

"Now... Let's see.... Where was that graveyard ?..."

The Game features full support only for the DualShock4 controller due to the aiming and shooting  currently being assigned to the TouchPad!

!!-- The Enemies will not be Ninjas -- They are just place holders--!!
